text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ever since joining Tracen Academy<n>as a trainer, the days
have been flying<n>by.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While out on a stroll, I find myself<n>walking around the
nearby shopping<n>district.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm done moving the last box,<n>ma'am!

text_block_list.name: Elderly Storekeeper
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my! Done already? I'm sorry,<n>dear. They were heavy,
weren't they?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! I'm used to doing all sorts<n>of heavy lifting back in
Hokkaido with<n>my mom! I had to help around the<n>family
farm!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Carrying a few boxes of veggies is<n>nothing!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But enough about that! How's your<n>hip, ma'am?

text_block_list.name: Elderly Storekeeper
text_block_list.text: Oh, I feel much better thanks to you.

text_block_list.name: Elderly Storekeeper
text_block_list.text:
You're a student at Tracen Academy,<n>right? I'm so sorry to
bother you in<n>the middle of training. Thank you so<n>much
for your help.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: No problem! Anyway, I gotta head<n>back now! Take care!

text_block_list.name: Elderly Storekeeper
text_block_list.text:
Hm? She ran off in the complete<n>opposite direction of the
academy...<n>Will she be all right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Worried that Special Week might be<n>lost, I decide to follow
her.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Phew... Pretty eventful for my first<n>time going out to run
around here, but<n>it was actually pretty nice! ...Wait!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Where even am I?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-w-w-w-what do I do?! I'm gonna<n>miss the dorm curfew!
choice_data_list:
Would you like to get back to Tracen
Academy?

Would you like to get back to Tracen
Academy?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Um, you are...?
choice_data_list: I'm a trainer. I'll show you the way back.
I'm a trainer. I'll show you the way back.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Really?! Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thanks a bunch! We made it back<n>just in time!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I have a big race tomorrow, so<n>I thought I'd spend
some of my time<n>off training. I might've gone a bit too<n>far,
though.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I just moved here from the<n>countryside, so I'm still not
used to<n>finding my way around the city... You<n>really did
come at the perfect time!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Spe! You're back! The school<n>gates were about to close
for the day,<n>and you still weren't here, so I got a<n>bit
worried...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, Suzuka! I'm sorry for making you<n>worry!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Um... all righty then. Trainer, thanks<n>again for bringing me
back in one<n>piece! I gotta go now.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: See ya!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a smile on her face, Special<n>Week heads back to the
Ritto<n>dormitory. Silence Suzuka bows lightly<n>towards me
before following behind<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next morning...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Trainer! It's finally<n>time for the tryout races.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
These races happen every two<n>months starting from June
for a grand<n>total of four times per year. All the<n>
up-and-coming students gather to<n>show off their abilities,
and prove to<n>the world that they're race-ready.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Every student here will be gunning to<n>prove their skills to
the best trainers in<n>hopes of getting scouted!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: I'm sure today's races will be just<n>as exciting as ever.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Please do!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
A trainer is meant to serve as a<n>racer's guide—to support
them when<n>times are tough, to lead them down<n>the right
path, and to seek glory<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I hope you meet someone whom you<n>can share a mutual
bond of trust.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: But in any case, good luck!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts begin shortly after, and<n>the many trainers in
attendance gaze<n>upon the rows of students in search<n>of a
runner with potential.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yo soy el número uno! This condor is<n>gonna soar to the
edge of the sky!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Now then! Which lucky trainer is<n>willing to stand by my
side? Any<n>takers?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although every student running today<n>is exceptionally
skilled, one in<n>particular stands out—her running is<n>
immaculate!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're at the race's last stretch! One<n>final corner! At the
center of<n>everybody's attention is Special<n>Week! She's in
third place, but it'll be<n>a close one!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ...Now!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Special Week suddenly pulls ahead!<n>She's weaving her
way to the very<n>front! She takes the lead!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm not done yet! Hraaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Special Week widens her lead! She's<n>ensuring the win! She
takes first<n>place!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... I did it! I won! NowI—

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh! You're the person from<n>yesterday! You came to watch
the<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... Thanks! I hope I managed to<n>show you what I'm
capable of!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I came to Tracen Academy to achieve<n>my dream, and it all
starts with my<n>debut... I'll make sure it happens, no<n>matter
what!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yep!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I wanna run in the most prestigious<n>races, where only the
best of the best<n>racers are allowed—the Twinkle<n>Series!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
So I have to run! I have to win! I have<n>to become strong
enough that I don't<n>ever lose! If I do that, then—

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'll become the best racer in all of<n>Japan—for me, for Mom
and Mama,<n>and for everybody else back home!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's my dream!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week gazes straight at me<n>with an intense look of
determination.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's as if just beyond those<n>glimmering eyes, she can see
the<n>shining future she dreams of gazing<n>back at her.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh... U-um... Are you still with me? Did<n>I say something
weird? Sorry about<n>that...
choice_data_list: I want to help you with your dream!
I want to help you with your dream!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: Please, let me be your trainer!
Please, let me be your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait... Are you scouting me?! For<n>real?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course! I'd love for you to be<n>my Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And with that, I become Special<n>Week's trainer.
